entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:59 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 8:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain early in the morning. Ice pellets beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
